h2_title: How to Save the Shen Monkey
content: You’ll first meet the Shen Monkey halfway into Chapter 1 in the Bamboo Grove of the Black Wind Mountain. After defeating the Yaoguai Chief, Guangmou, you’ll reach the **Marsh of the White Mist** Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Shen_Monkey_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Shen Monkey Questline', specifically from the subsection 'How to Save the Shen Monkey'.
The content is as follows:
You’ll first meet the Shen Monkey halfway into Chapter 1 in the Bamboo Grove of the Black Wind Mountain. After defeating the Yaoguai Chief, Guangmou, you’ll reach the **Marsh of the White Mist** Shrine.
